pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Experimental Designs for Dynamic/Functional Models // Optimal experimental designs for functional linear and functional generalised linear models, for scalar responses and profile/dynamic factors. The designs are optimised using the coordinate exchange algorithm. The methods are discussed by Michaelides (2023) https://eprints.soton.ac.uk/474982/1/Thesis_ DamianosMichaelides_Final_pdfa_1_.pdf.
